Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தூங்காமை கல்வி துணிவுடைமை இம்மூன்றும் நீங்கா நிலனான் பவர்க்கு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A sleepless promptitude, knowledge, decision strong: These three for aye to rulers of the land belong.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A king is depicted in a triptych (three-panel) style. The left panel shows him wide-eyed and vigilant at night, watching over his kingdom (Vigilance - தூங்காமை).
Layered_Composition.Midground: The center panel shows him deeply studying ancient scrolls and texts (Learning - கல்வி). The right panel shows him making a bold, decisive gesture on a battlefield map (Decisiveness - துணிவுடைமை).
Layered_Composition.Background: Each panel has a background that reinforces the theme: a starlit kingdom, a vast library, and a strategic military camp, respectively.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A ruler who never fails in the three essential qualities of vigilance, learning, and decisiveness, which are indispensable for governing a land.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The three distinct scenes in the triptych clearly delineate and emphasize each of the three core virtues.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The night panel has dramatic moonlight. The library panel has warm candlelight. The decisiveness panel has bright, clear daylight. The palette is rich and evocative of historical epics.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, cinematic shot that frames the three panels as a single, coherent artwork.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic with the texture of an ancient mural or tapestry.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Three distinct lighting schemes, one for each panel, creating visual interest and reinforcing the narrative.

Negative_Prompt: sleeping king, empty-handed, hesitant gesture, blurry, modern objects, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the background of each panel.
